heading: IChiba Product Data
Crawler
banner.subHeading: Access massive product data from hundreds of international e-commerce platforms and collect product data from leading e-commerce platforms for your selling websites/applications.

yourOwn.heading: Your own Crawler vs IChiba Crawler

content.title: Spend much hours to code the selling web data extraction logic.
Struggle to code the product catalog & collection manually.
Take much time to integrate with each ecommerce platforms.
Need to build the crawler code again if your selling website changes or has any problem.
No coding, automatically crawl and distribute data on your selling website.
Generate catalog hierarchy with the data collected.
Easily create customized item collections according to customer behaviors.
No need to build crawler code again even if your ecommerce website has any change.

heading: Crawl products from international ecommerce sites
ecommerceSites.subHeading: Businesses can choose to connect with any website from multiple markets

heading: Empower your online store
with seamless product integration and management

subscribed.title: Subscribed source
subscribed.content: Seamlessly integrate with international ecommerce platforms to import product data directly into your selling websites.

product.title: Product finder
product.content: Explore and identify products from global markets. Automatically crawl data and populate your website with tailored collection lists.

sourcePage.title: Source page
sourcePage.content: Update deals in real-time from all subscribed source pages. Add/Edit/Delete/Hide collections on your selling website or application.

catalog.title: Catalog hierarchy
catalog.content: Organize your products with ease, managing your catalogs through a user-friendly interface that supports robust catalog structures.

keywordList.title: Keyword list
keywordList.content: Enhance your SEO and improve product visibility with targeted keyword lists, making your products easier to find and your pages more likely to convert.

blackList.title: Black list
blackList.content: Protect your brand integrity by preventing certain products or terms from appearing in your store.

sellerList.title: Seller list
sellerList.content: View lists of sellers whose products have been viewed by customers on the storefront.

bidding.title: Bidding management
bidding.content: Manage everything regarding auctions on international e-commerce websites, from bank account/international cards to the auction accounts allocation, etc. Minimize risks such as accounts being locked, enhancing customer experience.

iChibaStoreFront.heading: Create your international selling website with IChiba StoreFront Layer
iChibaStoreFront.subHeading: Experience our full cross-border solution, from build storefront to manage international orders coherently. Let IChiba build a SEO-standard selling website, landing page, or even application, businesses just need to focus on scaling up.

omnichannelSelling.label: IChiba Commerce Layer
omnichannelSelling.heading: Omnichannel selling management is now just a piece of cake
omnichannelSelling.subHeading: Go global and expand your business without fear of overloading management.

useCases.label: Use cases
useCases.heading: Explore use cases where IChiba Crawler can be applied

contents.title: Proxy-shopping service
contents.des: IChiba Crawler helps proxy purchase business connect best-priced goods sources worldwide, save time and effort for manually updating product information and deals.

contents.title: Dropshipping
contents.des: We connect with the most reputable manufacturer partners to deliver abundant goods sources worldwide, from China, Japan, America, etc. for dropshipping businesses. Contact us now to learn more about the all-in-one dropshipping solution.
